 > (OOC: So FZ wants 3 of them to get blood? If so, from what?)


DNA is in all organics, Everything about them contains DNA, skin, hair,
blood, organs ect.

It can be obtained from natural animals or transformers with beast modes.

Lady Hawk was sent by her father Veratis to obtain samples to experiment on.

Transformers have DNA encoded on thier beast modes to blend in with the
world around them. It gives them certain atributes of these creatures, (Meat
eaters still eat meat, plant eaters still eat plants.Same could be said for
thier strengths and weaknesses.)

Optimus Prime said he would leave till the day when all was one. Veratis
believes that this means combining DNA along with Maximal and Predacon forms
to create one type of being. Once that happens he believes that Prime will
return to them.

Lady Hawk has been given the assignment to create some warriors that
transform into creatures similar to the movie "Aliens." She wants to use
this opportunity to test her fathers theory and combine Earth DNA with these
creatures to improve them.

any more questions?
